page.title: 03LITTER
page.content: There was a fair amount of litter at Ashton Court especially over the road from the Mansion House . Up in the woods there was not much litter ,most of it was empty cans .We went past the quarry and I didn't notice any litter .There weren't any litter bins until we got to the Ashton Court Golf Club .There were things to buy such as cold drinks ,ice creams but there were yellow bins to put rubbish in .People left litter on the tables because they were too lazy to put it in the bin .We all walked down past the cows and into the fields to get back to our school .There was a little litter in the playground {as {usual!.
